title: Sonic Mania
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. Need to update the .ini file: Set windowed mode from Y to N & set resolution to 1280x800. Save settings.
developer: Headcannon, PagodaWest Games, Sega Games, Christian Whitehead
description: Experience the ultimate celebration of past and future in Sonic Mania! Re-live the Sonic of the past with an exciting new twist on classic zones
